job_history.work_description: Initiated, built and developed relationships with clients to be the primary source for hardware and software in a defined territory. Responsible for sourcing, bidding and delivery of all equipment and overseeing sourcing from Channel distributors to ensure we meet the clients budget while at the same time maintaining profitability with our channel partners.

Managed and built client relationships with high net worth clients. Conceptualized researched, and implemented several pilot programs to insure profitability for both Charles Schwab Co and Charles Schwab Bank.

Directed and oversaw a team of 10 Account Executives. Executed several responsibilities; including reviewing loan submissions, collaborating with appraisers and the processing team to insure a seamless experience for the client.

Effectively managed a sales territory by identifying competitive market opportunities and building strategic relationship with CTX partners. Collaborated with internal teams and utilized accurate and timely quarterly forecasts to guarantee the proper execution of the sales process.

skills.name: Sales Management
skills.explanation: Over 15 years of experience in sales management, including managing a team of 10 Account Executives, indicates expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Account Management
skills.explanation: Extensive experience in managing client relationships, building strategic relationships, and overseeing sales processes, suggests expert-level proficiency.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Directed and oversaw a team of Account Executives, indicating expert-level leadership skills.

skills.name: Communication
skills.explanation: Effectively managed client relationships, collaborated with internal teams, and utilized accurate and timely quarterly forecasts, suggesting strong proficiency in communication.

skills.name: Strategic Planning
skills.explanation: Identified competitive market opportunities, built strategic relationships, and utilized quarterly forecasts to guarantee the proper execution of the sales process, indicating strong proficiency in strategic planning.

skills.name: Time Management
skills.explanation: Managed multiple responsibilities, including reviewing loan submissions, collaborating with appraisers, and processing teams, suggesting strong proficiency in time management.

skills.name: Team Collaboration
skills.explanation: Collaborated with internal teams, including appraisers and processing teams, to ensure a seamless experience for clients, indicating strong proficiency in team collaboration.

skills.name: Problem-Solving
skills.explanation: Implemented several pilot programs to ensure profitability, suggesting a solid working proficiency in problem-solving.
